attributes.action: pass legislation to force event organisers to remove temporary road-side signs within 24 hours of the event ending.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are so many road signs on British roads at present that road users can be distracted from using the roads safely. Is there a cycle race in progress or was it three weeks ago? Why is the countryside being desecrated by signs which have no reason to be there on safety grounds.
